name: Cartoon Cat (DEMO)
description:
You take it upon yourself to explore and photograph a bunker in which the owner has gone missing. The bunker has much history, and police are still yet to find the man. Can you solve the mysterious disappearance and deaths surrounding the bunker?

Additional Note: This is a demo so it isn't a complete game story/gameplay wise, and there may be bugs in it which I'll work to fix  as people play and leave feedback. Thanks!
